alert.note: Alert for Jefferson; Lewis; Oswego (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 20 at 3:26AM EST by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...A BAND OF HEAVY SNOW WILL AFFECT THE EASTERN LAKE ONTARIO REGION... HAZARDS...A band of heavy snow accompanied by winds of up to 30 MPH which can rapidly reduce visibility to less than a quarter of a mile. This band of heavy snow is producing extremely heavy snow at the rate of 2 to 3 inches per hour. LOCATION AND MOVEMENT...At 316 AM EST, a band of heavy snow was centered near Watertown moving south at 5 MPH. This band will impact Watertown and areas just to the south through 445 AM, including a portion of Interstate 81. LOCATIONS IMPACTED INCLUDE... Watertown, Fort Drum, Stony Point, Carthage, Lowville, West Carthage, Adams, Dexter, Glen Park, Herrings, Adams Center, Southwick Beach State Park, Henderson Harbor, Barnes Corners, Whetstone Gulf State Park, Denmark, New Bremen, Watson, Sackets Harbor and Martinsburg. This includes Interstate 81 between exits 37 and 49. SAFETY INFO... The snow will accumulate so rapidly that it will be extremely difficult for the road crews to keep the roads clear. &&
